org.csstudio.platform.model.pvs
Interface IProcessVariableAddress

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProcessVariableAdress
public interface IProcessVariableAddress

A process variable address provides consistent and convinient access to the information that constitute a full process variable name. These information include:

  • control system prefix (mandatory)
  • device (optional)
  • property (mandatory)
  • characteristic (optional)
Process variable addresses should in most cases get created, using the ProcessVariableAdressFactory factory.

Author:
Sven Wende
